body.name: Surge Protector, Multi Plug Outlet Extender with Night Light for Home, Office, School, Addtam 5-Outlet Splitter and 4 USB Ports(1 USB C), Wall Charger Power Strip, ETL Listed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 10 hrs 19 mins
features: 【9 IN 1 USB Wall Outlet】You get 4 USB charging ports (1 USB C) and 5 wide-spaced outlets; 3 side design plug extender provides large space; LED night light around the edge of the outlet extender makes life more convenient; removable screw and the plastic prong make it firmly attached to the outlets

【Smart & Soft Night Light】Dusk-To-Dawn sensor, automatically turns on only when ambient lighting becomes insufficient. The night light is soft, warm and comfortable, great for bedroom, bathroom, nursery, hallway, kitchen and more (PS: If it doesn't auto turn on when the light is dim or you don't need the night light, you can touch the Sensor Switch to turn the light ON or OFF)

【Double Stability & Wide Space】The screw included can be used to secure it on duplex outlet. The plastic prong at the back is for stable purposes also. For USB receptacle and GFCI outlet, the plastic prong needs to be cut off before use. 3-sided design and 1.7 inches large space between 5 sockets make it easier to use for all kinds of equipment
【1 USB- C & 3 USB-A】USB C charging port features 3A Max, USB A charging port features 2.4A Max, compatible with almost all usb devices(the actual current is decided by the demand for the devices)

【Super Safety】3 complementary surge protection circuits(TVS MOV GDT) with the minimum energy-absorbing capacity of 1050 Joules. This surge protector wall mount also has overload protection, short-circuit protection, over current protection, over-voltage protection and overheating protection
body.description: Light sensor Auto turn on ONLY at night or when ambient light is dim Touch Sensor Switch If you don't need night light, press touch sensor switch to turn off, remember to press touch sensor switch again if you need it later Attention: During packaging and transportation, the Touch Sensor may be pressed accidentally, causing the night light function to be turned off. Please press the touch sensor switch again to turn on night light function

Please press the touch sensor switch again to turn on night light function Specification Input Voltage: 100-240VAC; 60HZ Power Rating: 125V/15A 1875W USB Port Output: DC 5V, Total 3.1A USB-C Output: 3A Max Surge Protector Rating: 1050 joules Item Dimensions: 5.4*3.4*1.8in

Double Stability Just plug in for duplex outlet and decor outlet. The screw included can be used to secure it on duplex outlet. The plastic prong at the back is for stable purposes also. For USB receptacle and GFCI outlet, the plastic prong needs to be cut off before use. Wide Space 3-sided wide spaced 5 AC outlets to accommodate oversized power adapters without blocking other outlets. Larger spacing makes it easier to use for all kinds of equipment. 1050J Surge Protection 1050J surge protection can prevent your devices from lightning, spikes. The greem light on to show your devices are protected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!! Sleek and very functional!
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing and for the price, it's so worth it. It has one 'Apple' plug in and 3-4 USB plug ins, which saves the hassle of always having to find the wall charger things, which if you are like my wife or I, it's feast or famine with those suckers! Plus withe the power outlets all around the sides, it fits nicely behind a desk or couch. I will probably be getting several more. Nice quality and amazing price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Si simple to install!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality! Love the ambient light that only appears when you need it! Charging works great. Item is very stable and the appearance is perfect with just the right amount of light around the edges! Can be portable if needed to a different outlet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great nightlight and plug port
reviews.reviewText: These are super bright little night lights and work great for outlets as well. I bought them so I could plug my charging devices directly into the wall without having to have the USB adapter blocks. They work really well and it is so much more convenient to charge all of my devices now. Sometimes the light sensors that turn the nightlight on don't work when it gets dark, I don't think they are sensitive enough, but if you want them on you just have to put your hand over the light sensor for a second and they figure out that it is dark and turn on. This is only an occasional issue and easy enough to fix, and I bought these mainly for the plugs and not the nightlights so it doesn't really bother me too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and a nice solution, but will not power HomePod mini
reviews.reviewText: I bought several of these for family and myself. I like those with a center screw. I remove the existing faceplate and over tighten the outlet mounting screws so that after installation, the Outlet extender will be flush to the wall.This WILL NOT POWER AN APPLE HOMEPOD MINI. Not enough power supplied to the USB-C outlet.From Apple:"If an orange light shines on and off repeatedly on the top of HomePod mini, then HomePod mini is connected to a computer, or is plugged into a power adapter that isn’t rated 20W (9V ⎓ 2.22A).Plug your HomePod mini into power using a 20W (9V ⎓ 2.22A) adapter."So I have to waste one of the outlets for the "wall wart" for the proper power to my mini -- minus one star

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of outlets + "night light"
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for our family room because someone is always wanting to charge their phone or another electronic throughout the day. I like that it has regular outlets and USB ports. I didn't realize it when I bought it, but it has a "lighted ring" around the bottom (closest to the outlet) so it acts like a night light. So far, we have enjoyed it and use it often. A little too bulky for my travels, but still great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for by the bedstand
reviews.reviewText: For my fellow screen goblins, I can plug in my phone, watch, airpods, air purifier, weather radio, ham radio, and battery packs by my bedside. Am I a prepper? Am I a nerd? Or do I just have ADHD, working engineering, and collect hobbies like Pokemon? Yes. This thing works great! It fills a need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More features than expected.
reviews.reviewText: Completely replaces standard outlet with 4 outlets, multiple connections for common electronic charging ports. An added benefit I was not aware of until much later is the night light feature. Turns on when dark, off instantly when lights are turned on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: These are versatile and handy in multi-use areas. We bought several more we liked them so well.
This is such a great device, so handy, so many outlets and a night light, highly recommend!
